title: Unsung Heroes: Francesca Baroni on Racing While Deaf, Competing with the Best in the World
content:
The 23-year-old from Italy fell in love with cycling as a six-year-old after watching Ivan Basso winning the 2006 Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Unsung Heroes: Francesca Baroni on Racing While Deaf, Competing with the Best in the World on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
